name: Victor Borg
title: Design Lead, Scalapay
content:
It was a great experience! üòç

Henil has worked with me on multiple personal projects with me; I was very happy with his work. He has completed both UX/wireframe work as well as UI/visual design work; both completed to my satisfaction. he wasn't afraid to ask questions to ensure he understood the task. He took direction very well & was willing to learn.

name: Pritam Patil
title: Tech Lead, Shell
content:
Professional & Co-operative üòç

We Worked with Henil for the App UX/UI design. He is Experienced, and Co-Operative; always ready for adapting to new challenges to solve problems and achieve the quality of a product. We would like to recommend him without any hesitation who is looking for a professional designer & as well as a Co-operative and inquisitive team member with let's roll up sleeves attitude.
